In a quaint coastal village, young Leo discovered his extraordinary gift: he could breathe underwater. While other children splashed at the shore, Leo dove deep into the azure depths, befriending colorful fish and playful dolphins. One day, he stumbled upon a hidden underwater kingdom, ruled by a wise old turtle named Maris. Maris revealed that Leo was chosen to protect the ocean’s secrets. Together, they embarked on adventures, rescuing trapped sea creatures and mending coral reefs. As Leo returned to the surface, he understood his purpose: to bridge the worlds above and below, reminding everyone of the ocean’s magic and fragility.
